system.description:
Strengthened by conviction and empowered by faith, you stand as an example of all you hold dear. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain proficiency with heavy armor. If you are already proficient, you gain proficiency with a rare weapon of your choice instead.
  • Combine your cleric and herald levels for the purpose of all @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.s4iiatrup3e3virw]{Channel Divinity} features from either class.
  • The save DCs of your cleric spells are increased by +1 against creatures of the types selected for your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.01szspr1nunp0lql]{Divine Sense}.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in cleric, 3 levels in herald
